scripts.release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.test: npm run test:tslint && npm run test:tslint-rules && npm run test:tslint-type-check && npm run test:tslint-type-check-rules && npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:tslint-rules: ! tslint --config tslint.json --project tsconfig.json 2>&1 | grep -q 'Could not find implementations'
scripts.test:tslint-type-check-rules: ! tslint --config tslint.json --project tsconfig.json --type-check 2>&1 | grep -q 'Could not find implementations'
